segments.text: I see the water pouring out of the sink, and it’s making me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being so sneaky, taking cookies while she’s distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it looks like it’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him, her hand outstretched, ready to grab a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is while everything around her is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to warn them before someone slips or falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just waiting to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
